freeworkman3: where can i find a torrent of that 11gb Tron 3d that you talk about?

This is 44gb because it is a straight rip from a bluray. Dual Layer blu rays can hold 50gb of data, which 3d films take up. Most other 3d films you download will be smaller. Why? becuase they are compressed, and often SBS rips are 1920*1080 instead of 3840*1080 which 3d films are (because they have one image for each eye)
